overview: Get in the perverse world of Paul Thomas and discover the complex relationships between humans.  On one side Alexandra, a young open minded girl, spends her time between her mother's place in Los Angeles and her father's in Paris. She is in love with an older man, but suffers from his perverse phone games.  On the other side Nicole, a woman with strong principles, is facing the hazards of life : loneliness, loss of employment... However, she takes a job in a "phone sex" company. Her mistake will be to accept a date with a client. While Nicole, the mother, sinks into total perversion, Alexandra, the daughter, acts like a lesbian on vacation.  But what will happen when she comes back home and finds out that the man who is initiating her mother to the joy of sex is the love of her life?
title: Mother and Daughter
